name: Cyberpunk Metroidvania
description:
Navigate your way through a dystopian world, with lots of characters to guide you in the right direction. Collect envirosuits, warp cores, neobits and more, all allowing various abilities which get you deeper into the world. Can you collect enough neobits and find the railgun before you die?

Save feature allows your progress to be saved at the biochambers, recording your biodata, reincarnating you to try yet again.

Controls:

LEFT, RIGHT & UP CURSOR KEYS: move left, move, right and jump

X: Use sword if un-armed, fire gun if armed

Z: Draw gun

TAB: Cycle through different guns

D: Dash 

SHIFT: Use jetpack

SPACEBAR: Pause - show map & inventory 

ESC: Quit to menu from pause screen
